job_description: He / She Should Have Filed GST, ROC, and Income Tax Returns of Individuals, Firms and Companies.
The Candidate should have good proficiency in working on…
Daily Accounting entries from Bank Statement.
GST working and Payment, GSTR1 & GSTR3B, Reconciliation of GSTR2A.
Document Filing for Sales Invoices & Expenses.
Filing of Income Tax Returns.
Manage accounts payable and accounts receivable processes.
Reconcile bank statements and ensure accuracy of financial records.
Job Types: Part-time, Permanent.
The Assistant Accountant will be responsible for assisting in maintaining financial records, processing transactions, and supporting the accounting team with…
Must have knowledge of Tally and excel.
Total work: 2 years (Required).
The ideal candidate will be responsible for managing financial transactions, ensuring accuracy in financial documentation, and providing strategic financial…
Coordinating with clients for agreement renewals.
Coordinating with Legal consultants for supporting new agreements with clients.
Verification and accounting of invoices, bills, PO's etc.
Entries in tally (Accounting in Tally-Sale, Purchase, Payment, Receipt, Journal, Cash Voucher, Bank…
Booking entries in Tally - Sales, Purchases, Expenses etc.
Co-ordination of routine accounting activities.
Updating the Excel Sheets / MIS Reports.
Educational Qualification: M.com / B.com / MBA / Inter C.A.
Good to have skills: Good in English Communication & Writing Skills.
Total work: 1 year (Preferred).
